me.nimnon.nmengine.entity

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.Basic
      • me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.GameObject
        • me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends GameObject
    Game object with a graphic, graphics must be loaded or created with loadGraphic() or makeGraphic().
    Author:
    Nimnon

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.awt.Color color
      Object color, used in debug drawing
      boolean drawDebug
      If true the objects bounding box is drawn

      • Fields inherited from class me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.GameObject

        center, drag, height, last, maxVelocity, next, touching, velocity, width, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite()
      Creates basic instance of a Sprite, uses the default graphic
      Sprite(double x, double y)
      Creates basic instance of a Sprite at position x and y, uses the default graphic
      Sprite(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates basic instance of a Sprite at position x and y, creates graphic to size using a random color
      Sprite(Rect rect)
      Creates basic instance of a Sprite with the dimensions of the supplied Rect, creates graphic to size using a random color

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw()
      Draw sprite to cameras it appears on
      void makeGraphic()
      Creates graphic to width and height automatically with a random color
      void makeGraphic(java.awt.Color color)
      Creates graphic to width and height automatically
      void makeGraphic(int width, int height, java.awt.Color color)
      Creates a rectangle for a graphic
      void setGraphic(java.lang.String path)
      Sets graphic to image at path, image must be located in the assets folder
      void setGraphic(java.lang.String path, boolean animated, int width, int height)
      Sets graphic to image at path, image must be located in the assets folder

      • Methods inherited from class me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.GameObject

      • setGraphic

        public void setGraphic(java.lang.String path,
              boolean animated,
              int width,
              int height)
        Sets graphic to image at path, image must be located in the assets folder
        Parameters:
        path - - Path to image
        animated - - Is the object animated (Is it a spritesheet?)?
        width - - Width of sprite (Used for splitting the spritesheet)
        height - - Height of sprite (Used for splitting the spritesheet)
